statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY building_id ASC;
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE consumption_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_consumed_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_consumed_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE building_id = 3;
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT building_id, MAX(energy_consumed), AVG(energy_consumed) FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY building_id DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY consumption_date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_consumed_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100 GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_consumed_energy > 500 ORDER BY total_consumed_energy DESC
SELECT building_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id HAVING avg_energy_consumed < 200 ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS readings_count FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id HAVING readings_count > 5 ORDER BY readings_count DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT building_id, date FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT building_id, current_energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT * FROM BuildingInfo
SELECT building_name, address FROM BuildingInfo
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, address FROM BuildingInfo WHERE building_id = 2;
SELECT building_name, current_energy_consumption FROM BuildingInfo b INNER JOIN EnergyConsumptionData e ON b.building_id = e.building_id;
SELECT MAX(current_energy_consumption) AS max_energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, SUM(current_energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT building_name, location FROM BuildingInformation WHERE building_area > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyReport WHERE efficiency_score > 80;
SELECT building_name, efficiency_score, recommendation FROM BuildingInformation JOIN EfficiencyReport ON BuildingInformation.building_id = EfficiencyReport.building_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT building_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT building_name, location, building_area FROM BuildingInformation ORDER BY location ASC, building_area DESC;
SELECT report_id, efficiency_score, recommendation FROM EfficiencyReport WHERE efficiency_score > 80 AND timestamp < '2022-06-01 00:00:00';
SELECT e.building_id, e.timestamp, e.energy_usage, b.building_name FROM EnergyConsumptionData e JOIN BuildingInformation b ON e.building_id = b.building_id;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT floor_number, square_footage FROM floors WHERE building_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(total_energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM buildings;
SELECT reading_date, energy_consumed FROM energy_readings WHERE meter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_id, building_name, address FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, total_energy_consumption FROM buildings WHERE total_energy_consumption > 1000;
SELECT b.building_name, f.floor_number, f.square_footage FROM buildings b INNER JOIN floors f ON b.building_id = f.building_id WHERE f.square_footage > 5000;
SELECT e.reading_date, e.energy_consumed, m.meter_type FROM energy_readings e INNER JOIN meters m ON e.meter_id = m.meter_id WHERE e.energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY e.reading_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE building_id > 3 ORDER BY building_id ASC;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT building_name, address, energy_consumption FROM Buildings JOIN EnergyReadings ON Buildings.building_id = EnergyReadings.building_id WHERE energy_consumption > 500;
SELECT building_name, alert_message, alert_datetime FROM Buildings JOIN Alerts ON Buildings.building_id = Alerts.building_id WHERE alert_datetime >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT building_name, location, value FROM Buildings JOIN Sensors ON Buildings.building_id = Sensors.sensor_id JOIN SensorReadings ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorReadings.sensor_id WHERE reading_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY value DESC;
